title: Business Management
marketTargetedTagline: market targeted tag line, people coming here are hot, reiterate the marketing angle and get them on board
majorArgument: A message of understanding, empathise with the customers pains
offerOne: Describe how Rapid Platform help businesses keep everything important in one place
offerTwo: A snappy paragraph about workflow and how automation can save you time and money
offerThree: Talk about how reporting can help identify opportunities or highlight areas for improvement
closingArgument: A message of hope, speak of cohesion, transparency, manageability. Rapid can help your business thrive in an ever changing world etc
justificationHeader: Justification Header, still got questions? etc
justificationBody:
This area should discuss how we have helped people allready.

It should include some stats of hours saved via process automation etc
